tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vendor_risk_assessment (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
   financial_stability VARCHAR(50),
   reputation VARCHAR(50),
   service_quality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_risk_assessments (
    vendor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    financial_stability_rating INT NOT NULL,
    reputation_rating INT NOT NULL,
    service_quality_rating INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_stability_scores (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
    score_date DATE NOT NULL,
    score_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vendor_id FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendor_risk_assessments(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE service_quality_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vendor_id FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendor_risk_assessments(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vendors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    financial_stability FLOAT,
    reputation VARCHAR(255),
    service_quality FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_risk_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    financial_stability_score INT,
    reputation_score INT,
    service_quality_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE financial_stability_report (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    stability_rating VARCHAR(50),
    annual_revenue DECIMAL,
    debt_ratio DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE reputation_review (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    review_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE service_quality_evaluation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluator_name VARCHAR(255),
    evaluation_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_summary (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    overall_score INT,
    risk_category VARCHAR(50),
    assessment_date DATE
);
